price: E mostrar-se-lhes-ão as más obras que cometiam. E envolvê-los-á aquilo de que zombavam.
arabic: وَبَدَا لَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا عَمِلُواْ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wabadā lahum sayyiātu mā ʿamilū waḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihi yastahziūna
